ConformancePackInputParameter.description: Input parameters in the form of key-value pairs for the conformance pack.
ConformancePackInputParameter.markdownDescription:
Input parameters in the form of key-value pairs for the conformance pack.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ParameterName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

ParameterValue.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Update requires: No interruption

AccountId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

OrganizationConformancePackName.description: The name of the organization conformance pack.
OrganizationConformancePackName.markdownDescription:
The name of the organization conformance pack.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z][-a-zA-Z0-9]*  
Update requires: Replacement

TemplateS3Uri.description: Location of file containing the template body.
TemplateS3Uri.markdownDescription:
Location of file containing the template body.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: s3://.*  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateBody.description: A string containing full conformance pack template body.
TemplateBody.markdownDescription:
A string containing full conformance pack template body.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1

DeliveryS3Bucket.markdownDescription:
AWS Config stores intermediate files while processing conformance pack template.

---

Required: No  
Type: String

Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryS3KeyPrefix.description: The prefix for the delivery S3 bucket.

The prefix for the delivery S3 bucket.

---

Required: No
